document_data.name: Trifakas
document_data.mainbody: '''Trifakas''' was a [[wizard]] in a quest for [[Martek]]'s sphere of power. He became stuck in the [[Garden of the Cursed]] together with [[Sardok]] and [[Pawnis]], the only other survivors of his band, until other adventurers arrived.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|110}}
document_data.Abilities: Trifakas had top-notch intellect, outstanding agility, and a fairly good charisma, though he was quite scrawny. His spellbook included a number of spells, including ''[[charm person]]'', ''[[comprehend languages]]'', ''[[jump]]'', ''[[write]]'', ''[[darkness|darkness, {{SI|15|foot}} radius]]'', ''[[forget]]'', ''[[web]]'', ''[[wizard lock]]'', ''[[fireball]]'', ''[[haste]]'', ''[[lightning bolt]]'', ''[[slow]]'', ''[[fumble]]'', ''[[polymorph other]]'', ''[[polymorph self]]'', ''[[feeblemind]]'', ''[[magic jar]]'', ''[[passwall]]'', ''[[teleport]]'' and ''[[legend lore]]''.
document_data.Relationships:
Trifakas was not interested in working with anyone else beyond his immediate crew, and would use guile and subterfuge with anyone else. He was very interested in learning as much as he could from other arrivals, but he took pains to conceal this interest. In particular, he wanted to have the Star Gems used under his supervision if possible, or stolen if not; he was willing to join others only as a last resort.

The paladin [[Percivilis]] knew of him.
